deleted.label: Task deleted
deleted.title: Task was deleted, report download could not be available.

notFound.label: No renderer
notFound.title: No renderer is available for given report

report-create.success: Report [{{record}}] will be created asynchronously. Report can be downloaded from reports agenda.

generic-entity-report.label: Report
generic-entity-report.title: Report selected objects to xls spreadsheet

REPORT_GENERATE_SUCCESS.title: Report is completed
REPORT_GENERATE_SUCCESS.message: Report [{{reportName}}] was successfully completed. Report is available in report agenda.

REPORT_GENERATE_FAILED.title: Report failed
REPORT_GENERATE_FAILED.message: Report [{{reportName}}] generation failed. Failure reason is available in report agenda.

REPORT_WRONG_DEFINITION.title: Report failed
REPORT_WRONG_DEFINITION.message: Report type [{{firstType}}] is wrong. Should be [{{secondType}}].

REPORT_NO_FORM_ATTRIBUTE.title: Report failed
REPORT_NO_FORM_ATTRIBUTE.message: No form attribute with name [{{code}}] found!
